item.description: Discover the top privacy-focused browsers - LibreWolf, Brave, Firefox, and Tor - for a secure online experience.

item.title: Windows 10 System-Wide Ad Blocker Script for Better Privacy and Security
item.category: "Windows 10" , "ad-blocker" , "telemetry blocking" , "PowerShell script" , "system-wide ad-blocking" , "privacy" , "security" , "EasyList" , "Easy Privacy" , "NoCoin Filter List" , "AdGuard DNS filter" , "YoYo Lists" , "Peter Lowe's ad tracking malware servers" , "Windows Firewall" , "domain lists" , "block Windows trackers" , "block trackers" , "block ads" , "block tracking"
item.description: Block ads, trackers, and telemetry on Windows 10 using this powerful PowerShell script that utilizes the hosts file and Windows Firewall for system-wide ad-blocking.
